intro: Psychotria fuscopilosa, commonly known as the dark-leaf psychotria, is a flowering plant native to Central and South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its dark green, leathery leaves and clusters of small, white or pale pink flowers. It is often found in humid, shaded environments such as tropical rainforests. Psychotria fuscopilosa is also known for its alkaloid content, which has been studied for potential medicinal properties.
